sentences.en: A goldfish has a memory span of there seconds.
sentences.cn: 金鱼只有三分钟的记忆.

sentences.en: A goldfish LanChou belongs to the egg, dorsal fin.
sentences.cn: 兰畴属于蛋种金鱼, 无背鳍.

sentences.en: A goldfish rose to the surface of the little pond, with a sharp rippling sound.
sentences.cn: 那小池塘里, 一条金鱼浮上水面来,激起一片涟漪,清脆的一声响.

sentences.en: As in the case of the goldfish, one can use either picture as a model of the universe.
sentences.cn: 同碗中金鱼的情形仿佛，一个人可以用两幅图画中的任一一张作为宇宙之模式。

sentences.en: Austin told of his crime . He had stolen the fancy goldfish.
sentences.cn: 受惊的孩子被领到马车前. 在马车里的是卡拉卡瓦国王本人.

sentences.en: Eight goldfish are all orange and one is black .
sentences.cn: 八条金鱼都是桔黄色的，只有一条是黑的。

sentences.en: Goldfish were swimming lazily in a group just under the surface.
sentences.cn: 金鱼聚在一起贴着水面懒洋洋地游着。

sentences.en: Goldfish, dogs, cats and birds are the four most common pets.
sentences.cn: 金鱼 、 狗 、 猫和鸟是人们最喜欢宠养的四种动物.

sentences.en: Hello. Today I'd like to tell you about the fantail goldfish.
sentences.cn: 你好. 今天我要给你们讲一讲扇尾金鱼.

sentences.en: Living in this goldfish bowl of publicity would crack the strongest marriage.
sentences.cn: 生活在这种全无隐私可言的环境之下，最牢固的婚姻也会破裂。

sentences.en: Okay ? but be sure to move the goldfish out of the way this time.
sentences.cn: 好 吧,但这次一定要把金鱼缸搬开.

sentences.en: She has been living in a goldfish bowl since she won the beauty contest.
sentences.cn: 自从她选美获胜后,她就像活在金鱼缸中,任人参观,毫无隐私.

sentences.en: The advert featured a dolphin swimming around a goldfish bowl.
sentences.cn: 该广告的內容为一条在金鱼缸里游动的海豚.

sentences.en: The fisher drew in the net and found two goldfish in it.
sentences.cn: 渔夫收了网,发现有两条金鱼在里面.

sentences.en: The goldfish swam round and round in their tiny bowls.
sentences.cn: 金鱼在小小的鱼缸里一圈圈地游来游去。

sentences.en: The pond contains a mixture of goldfish and carp.
sentences.cn: 池塘里混养着金鱼和鲤鱼.

sentences.en: There was splash goldfish in the pond, and a big goldfish bobbed up.
sentences.cn: 水池里泼剌一声, 一条大金鱼窜了起来.

phrases.tran_cn: 金鱼缸（无法躲开众人耳目的地方）

trans.tran_en: a small shiny orange fish often kept as a pet
